member.summary: To be used for data tables with server side processing.
member.param: An Enumerable with the records to be shown in the data table. With server side processing the Enumerable must contain only records of the page to display, filtered and sorted accordingly.
An integer value that counts the number of requests. This means that every time you page, sort, etc., this value is increased by one. It can be taken from the .
The total number of records that the data source would deliver without filtering.
The number of records that the data source provides after filtering.

member.name: M:DataTables.MVC.Control.Infrastructure.TableBuilder`1.Column``1(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{`0,``0}},DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.ColumnConfiguration,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a simple text column to the data table.
member.typeparam: The data property of the model.
member.param: An expression to identify the column value.

The name of a JavaScript function that controls the output of the value. If no function is specified, the value is simply output as a string. If a name is given, only the name needs to be given, without parentheses.The fragment "(data, type, row, meta)" is always appended to the name, so that these four parameters are available in the JavaScript function.

member.name: T:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.AjaxDataTableRequestModel
member.summary: Represents an ajax request from the data table to the server if the parameter ServerSide = true is in the .

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.AjaxDataTableRequestModel.Draw
member.summary: An integer value that counts the number of requests. I. e., each time you page, sort, etc., this value is increased by one.

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.AjaxDataTableRequestModel.Start
member.summary: The zero-based index of the first record to return.

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.AjaxDataTableRequestModel.Length
member.summary: The number of records to return.

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.AjaxDataTableRequestModel.SearchValue
member.summary: The search term for which the data should be searched.

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.AjaxDataTableRequestModel.SearchColumns
member.summary: The names of the columns to search for the search term. The list contains all columns that have the parameter Searchable = true according to their .

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.AjaxDataTableRequestModel.OrderColumn
member.summary: The name of the column by which to sort the result.

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.AjaxDataTableRequestModel.OrderDirection
member.summary: The sort direction by which the result should be sorted.

member.name: T:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.ColumnConfiguration
member.summary: Contains the configuration for the display and behavior of a column.

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.ColumnConfiguration.ClassName
member.summary: A name of a CSS clas which is added to the table cells (td tags). (optional)

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.ColumnConfiguration.Orderable
member.summary: A parameter that determines whether this column is sortable. Default value: true

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.ColumnConfiguration.Searchable
member.summary: A parameter that determines whether this column is searchable. Default value: true

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.ColumnConfiguration.Title
member.summary: Sets the column heading. If nothing is specified here, the heading is determined via the display attribute of the property of the model. (optional)

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.ColumnConfiguration.Visible
member.summary: A parameter that determines whether this column is visible. Default value: true

member.name: M:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.ColumnConfiguration.ToHtml5Data
member.summary: Converts the settings into Html data attributes. This method is only for internal purposes.

member.name: T:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.NumericConfiguration
member.summary: Contains the configuration for the display of a column with numerical values.

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.NumericConfiguration.ThousandsSeperator
member.summary: Sets the thousands separator. Default value: . (dot)

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.NumericConfiguration.DecimalSign
member.summary: Sets the decimal separator. Default value: , (comma)

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.NumericConfiguration.DecimalPlaces
member.summary: Specifies the number of decimal places. Default value: 0 (no decimal places)

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.NumericConfiguration.ValueAppendix
member.summary: A value that is inserted after the actual data value (e.g. a currency symbol).

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.NumericConfiguration.ValuePrependix
member.summary: A value that is inserted before the actual data value (e.g. a currency symbol).

member.name: T:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.DateTimeConfiguration
member.summary: Contains the configuration for the display of a column with date or time values.

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.DateTimeConfiguration.DateTimeFormat
member.summary: Specifies the date and time format of the column. Note: This entry must be in a format valid for moment.js.

member.name: T:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.LinkConfiguration
member.summary: Contains the configuration for the display and the content of a column with a link.

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.LinkConfiguration.InnerHtml
member.summary: Specifies the text to be linked. In this text, placeholders in curly brackets can be used to reference values from the data record.

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.LinkConfiguration.CssClass
member.summary: A Css class name which is added to the link (to the button resp. a tag, optional).

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.LinkConfiguration.Target
member.summary: The javascript function or url to be linked. In this text, placeholders in curly brackets can be used to reference values from the data record.

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.LinkConfiguration.LinkType
member.summary: A parameter that determines whether the link should be a script or a url.

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.LinkConfiguration.TagType
member.summary: A parameter that determines whether the link is created as button or a tag.

member.name: M:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.LinkConfiguration.ResolveTarget(System.String)
member.summary: Replaces the placeholders in the link (Target). This method is for internal purposes only.

member.name: M:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.LinkConfiguration.ResolveInnerHtml(System.String)
member.summary: Replaces the placeholders in the linked text (InnerHtml). This method is for internal purposes only.

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.TableConfiguration.HasOrdering
member.summary: A parameter that determines whether the table is sortable. If false, the column titles are not linked for sorting and no sort direction is displayed. Default value: true

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.TableConfiguration.HasPaging
member.summary: A parameter that determines whether the data is displayed page by page. Default value: true

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.TableConfiguration.HasSearching
member.summary: A parameter that determines whether the table provides a search field. Default value: true

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.TableConfiguration.ShowProcessingIndicator
member.summary: A parameter that determines whether a hint should be displayed while data is loading. The content of this note can be customized via a language file if necessary. Default value: true

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.TableConfiguration.HasPageLengthMenu
member.summary: A parameter that determines whether to display a drop-down menu for selecting the number of rows displayed. Default value: true

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.TableConfiguration.ServerSide
member.summary: A parameter that determines whether the data should be filtered and sorted on the server side or on the client side. Default value: false

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.TableConfiguration.AjaxReadUrl
member.summary: The url from which to read the data for the table.

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.TableConfiguration.Order
member.summary: With this parameter, the initial sorting of the table is determined. The parameter is of type OrderConfiguration, which contains a column number (zero-based) and a sort order. Default value: [0, Ascending]

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.TableConfiguration.InitalPageLength
member.summary: This parameter determines how many data records are initially displayed on each page. Default value: 10

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.TableConfiguration.PageLengthMenu
member.summary: A parameter that populates the drop down menu values for changing the page length. Default value: [10, 20, 30, 40, 50]

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.TableConfiguration.LanguageFileUrl
member.summary: A url under which a language file for the standard texts of the data table can be loaded. By default, all texts are in English. (optional)

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.TableConfiguration.ControlDefinition
member.summary: A string that defines the order in which the controls (search field, pager, etc.) should be arranged around the table and whether additional div elements should be added. (optional)

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.TableConfiguration.DrawCallbackFunction
member.summary: The name of a Javascript function that is called after the table has been rendered (draw event). (optional)

member.name: M:DataTables.MVC.Control.Models.TableConfiguration.ToHtml5Data
member.summary: Converts the settings into Html data attributes. This method is only for internal purposes.

member.name: T:DataTables.MVC.Control.Resources.Scripts
member.summary: Eine stark typisierte Ressourcenklasse zum Suchen von lokalisierten Zeichenfolgen usw.

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Resources.Scripts.ResourceManager
member.summary: Gibt die zwischengespeicherte ResourceManager-Instanz zurück, die von dieser Klasse verwendet wird.

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Resources.Scripts.Culture
member.summary: Überschreibt die CurrentUICulture-Eigenschaft des aktuellen Threads für alle Ressourcenzuordnungen, die diese stark typisierte Ressourcenklasse verwenden.

member.name: P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Resources.Scripts.AjaxDataTableInitFunction
P:DataTables.MVC.Control.Resources.Scripts.AjaxDataTableInitFunction_es5_min
member.summary: Sucht eine lokalisierte Zeichenfolge, die "use strict";var initAjaxDataTable=function(n,t,i){var f=$("#"+n).data("languagefile"),e=$("#"+n).data("ajaxurl"),r="GET",u;if($("#"+n).data("server-side")===!0&&(r="POST"),u=$("#"+n).DataTable({ajax:{url:e,type:r},language:{url:f},columnDefs:t}),i!==undefined)u.on("draw",i)}; ähnelt.
